EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name} ,
You have successfully registered for {!Course.Name} course. We wish you best of luck for your upcoming sessions related to course. Please do will the enlisted details
1. Start Plan Date 2. End Plan Date 3. Course Fees 4. Number of Students you want to mentor in a batch i.e. Student to mentor ratio
and in case you want any session to be self-paced please do upload the link of YouTube video which will be helpful to mentees for the respective session.
Best Wishes Utilitarian Labs
